title: Food, Emergency Aid, Shelter and Training (Earth-616)

main.*:
{{Marvel Database:Organization Template | Title = [[F.E.A.S.T.]] | Image = Food, Emergency Aid, Shelter and Training (Earth-616) from Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 546 001.png | Name = [[Food, Emergency Aid, Shelter and Training]] | Aliases = [[F.E.A.S.T.]] | Status = Active | Identity = Public | Reality = Earth-616 | BaseOfOperations = [[New York City]], [[New York (State)|New York]] | Leaders = [[Maybelle Parker (Earth-616)|May Parker]]; formerly [[Mister Negative (Earth-616)|Martin Li]] | CurrentMembers = [[Maybelle Parker (Earth-616)|May Parker]], [[Randolph Robertson (Earth-616)|Randy Robertson]], [[Andrea Benton (Earth-616)|Andi Benton]], [[Character Index/G#Guinevere|Guinevere]] | FormerMembers = [[Edward Brock (Earth-616)|Eddie Brock]], [[Character Index/E#Enrico|Enrico]], [[Character Index/K#Ken|Ken]], [[Mister Negative (Earth-616)|Martin Li]], [[Character Index/T#Tyler|Tyler]] | Allies = | Enemies = | Origin = Association of support for poor or homeless people.
Cover for [[Mister Negative (Earth-616)|Mister Negative]] criminal empire | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Dan Slott; Steve McNiven | First = Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 548 | History = On its surface FEAST was a charity to help the homeless and underprivileged but in reality it was a front for [[Mister Negative (Earth-616)|Mister Negative]]'s criminal activities and a base of operations for his gang the [[Inner Demons (Earth-616)|Inner Demons]].{{r|Amazing Spider-Man #548}} The FEAST charity remained open after Martin Li and Mister Negative were revealed as one and the same.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man #664}} At an unknown period, F.E.A.S.T. ended up shutting down. However, after encountering and caring for a [[Edward Leeds (Earth-616)|homeless man]] who saved her life, [[Maybelle Parker (Earth-616)|May Parker]] decided to reopen the project on her own, [[Randolph Robertson (Earth-616)|Randy Robertson]] aiding her.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 5 15}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Charities]]
